title: Problem With Skin Prices
body: Simply look at the store. Scorched Earth Xerath and a few others have jumped from 975 to 1350. I believe this to be a bug, maybe. Or did I miss something?

replies.body: How long has it been since you played the game or have been updated about the game? SE Xerath used to be price tagged at 975 but has increased to 1350 and has been for around 2 years. This has happened to some other skins such as SR Draven. It was back when they did the repricing 2 years ago along with a statement about skin tiers.
Ah, that could be it! Just wanted to make sure the 'few others' were intentional as well!
Do you happen to have a screenshot?

Here. As I recall (I was planning on buying the skin for a friend a while back but got him Battlecast Xerath) It was 975. Maybe I'm crazy haha but thank you for showing you are intrigued by it. It's also at the bottom right.
Katey, if you remember the skin pricing change thing that causes sweetheart annie to have orange particles instead of pink, then you will probably remember that they got bumped up a while back
